title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 hit $110 in four colors, Pixel 6 Pro Amazon low, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by Samsung’s ANC Galaxy Buds 2 hitting $110. That’s alongside a new Amazon low on Google Pixel 6 Pro and Synology’s DS220j 2-Bay starter NAS at $170. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 hit $110 in four colors, Pixel 6 Pro Amazon low, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's latest Galaxy Buds 2 ANC earbuds are now on sale for $110 in four different styles to go alongside Pixel 6 Pro and more.
